c.name: Jay Renz G. Mantala
c.description: is an Filipino business man, CEO of Google Company and software engineer who is the creator and, historically, the lead developer of the Linux kernel, used by Linux distributions and other operating systems such as Android. He also created the distributed version control system Git.
c.hobbies: Playing Computer and Mobile, Playing Basketball, Board Games and Swimming

c.name: James M. Tan
c.description: Hi, My name is James Tan, from Villa Mendez, Mogpog, Marinduque. I'm currently 20 years old and I'm born on December 20, 2002. I'm second year student in Marinduque State College, taking Information Technology.
c.hobbies: Playing Online Games, Watching Movies, Anime and Cooking and Art
